Title: Are Covid Vaccines really vaccines? If not, what are they?
Thesis: Definitions Matter. Are there any other similar technologies that work the same way as Covid Vaccines?

Piece.Title: Wikipedia definition of Vaccine
Piece.Thesis: According to Wikipedia, a vaccine provides immunity

Content.Title: Vaccine
Content.Summary: A vaccine is a biological preparation that provides active acquired immunity to a particular infectious disease.[1] A vaccine typically contains an agent that resembles a disease-causing microorganism and is often made from weakened or killed forms of the microbe, its toxins, or one of its surface proteins. The agent stimulates the body's immune system to recognize the agent as a threat, destroy it, and to further recognize and destroy any of the microorganisms associated with that agent that it may encounter in the future. Vaccines can be prophylactic (to prevent or ameliorate the effects of a future infection by a natural or "wild" pathogen), or therapeutic (to fight a disease that has already occurred, such as cancer).[2][3][4][5] Some vaccines offer full sterilizing immunity, in which infection is prevented completely.[6]

Piece.Title: Recombinant DNA is a technology that allows cells to produce foreign proteins, from foreign genes
Piece.Thesis: Recombinant DNA is inserted in host cells and these cells then produce new proteins that would not be produced without the inserted DNA

Piece.Title: GMO crops and foods are made with Recombinant DNA Technology

Content.Title: Genetically modified organism
Content.Summary: Genetically modified organisms (GMOs) are produced using scientific methods that include recombinant DNA technology and reproductive cloning. In reproductive cloning, a nucleus is extracted from a cell of the individual to be cloned and is inserted into the enucleated cytoplasm of a host egg (an enucleated egg is an egg cell that has had its own nucleus removed).

Piece.Title: Covid mRNA Vaccines hack your human cells into producing non human proteins

Content.Title: Covid mRNA Vaccines are a Form of Gene Therapy

Piece.Title: The FDA demands to have 55 years before they disclose the details of approving Pfizer vaccines
Piece.Thesis: Seems like the Food And Drug Administration has Pfizers back when it comes to disclosing the data on which the Covid-vaccine approval was based.

Content.Author: Jenna Greene
Content.Title: Wait what? FDA wants 55 years to process FOIA request over vaccine data
Content.Summary: (Reuters) - Freedom of Information Act requests are rarely speedy, but when a group of scientists asked the federal government to share the data it relied upon in licensing Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine, the response went beyond typical bureaucratic foot-dragging.

Piece.Title: Covid-Vaccinated patients are dying of Covid due to waning immunity
Piece.Thesis: A vaccine is supposed to give immunity. Immunity means protection. And yet Covid-vaccinated patients are dying. If it's not a vaccine, what else could it be?

Content.Title: Vaccinated patients are dying of Covid due to waning immunity, says Dr Susan Hopkins
Content.Summary: Double-jabbed vulnerable and elderly people are dying from Covid-19 due to the efficacy of the vaccine waning, a senior adviser has said.

Piece.Title: Do Pharmaceutical giants like Pfizer have a good track record?
Piece.Thesis:
Pfizer is regularly paying huge fines up to billions of dollars for false claims and illegally lobbying governments and doctors to push their products.

Parent Company Name:  Pfizer
Penalty total since 2000:  $4,660,896,333
Number of records:  71

Piece.Title: Merriam-webster definition of Immunity
Piece.Thesis: "the power to keep yourself from being affected by a disease" "the ability of an organism to resist a particular infection or toxin by the action of specific antibodies"

Content.Title: immunity
Content.Summary: the ability of an organism to resist a particular infection or toxin by the action of specific antibodies or sensitized white blood cells.

Piece.Title: What is the significance of a therapy labeled a vaccine rather than labeled simply a medical treatment?
Piece.Thesis: If a medical treatment is labeled a Vaccine, the Pharmaceutical company is not liable for damages. If damages are awarded to an injured vaccine taker, it's the government that is responsible. So the taxpayer is bailing out the Pharmaceutical companies.

Content.Author: James Hamblin
Content.Title: Why the Government Pays Billions to People Who Claim Injury by Vaccines
Content.Summary: A little-known deal protects drug companies in the U.S. from being sued—and feeds conspiracy theories in the process.
